snippet: Ronald Reagan's former political director, Haley Barbour, chides fellow Republicans for the risky mistake of recalling him as if he were an ideological purist.
abstract: Ronald Reagan's former political director, Haley Barbour, chides fellow Republicans for the risky mistake of recalling him as if he were an ideological purist.
lead_paragraph: Haley Barbour, Ronald Reagan's former political director, used a graveside tribute for the president's 101st birthday on Monday to warn Republican presidential candidates and voters alike that they are courting defeat by demanding in Reagan's name a conservative purity he did not represent.
